name: Trailbreaker Rolling Sky Ball - Manic Bowling in the Stars
name_original: Trailbreaker Rolling Sky Ball - Manic Bowling in the Stars
description:
New Version 3.0 of Trailbreaker Jupiter Edition Android Game available.
Major update! Tons of new game features. Just to name a few:

  • - crazy curved racing tracks
  • - various moving obstacles to make your life a bit more difficult.
  • - game pickups you'll love:
    • Power jumps
    • Extra jumps
    • Extra life
    • Extra time

Arcade Level pack compete for one of the hardest game on the Android market.

Drive your ball "Jupiter" along a series of suspended courses. You need determination and dexterity to finish this game. Roll left and right to avoid the cracks and be careful not to fall off the edge of the path as you go. Thundering into the unknown at breakneck speed, are you agile enough to negotiate the perils of Trailbreaker?

New version brings up warp speed visual effect during game-play. Now, its really feel like to travel at warp speed.

Racing on cosmic causeway roads . Fast and catchy action/arcade game that involves the player to direct a sphere along a series of suspended courses. Be sure to identify and perhaps avoid the special bumpy tiles.

8 level packs. Over 250 levels.

Including easy starter levels, arcade mode, hi speed levels, slow down levels and more.

Some levels limits number of jumps and number of lives. There are levels you'll race against time. Races are quite brief and usually last between 20 and 90 seconds.

  • Game for real action/arcade fans
  • Wide variety of fun levels that you can play
  • Challenge level episodes included
  • Special Space Junk episode
  • Fun with randomly generated levels

    Almost every Trailbreaker game level has been named after real celestial object. Once you successfully finish a level, random interesting fact about Jupiter will be shown.

    Thank you for playing, always.
